cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("fail")

	FAIL("! did not succeed").IF("ctx.src == null").IGNORE_FAILURE(true)

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: fail
processors:
  - fail:
      tag: fail_7a842d45
      if: ctx.src == null
      message: '! did not succeed'
      ignore_failure: true
